mapper.insert: INSERT INTO te_qna (qna_num, qna_title, qna_contents, admin_id, qna_division) VALUES(SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{qna_title},#{qna_contents}, #{admin_id}, '1')
mapper.select: SELECT qna_num, qna_title, qna_contents, admin_id FROM te_qna WHERE qna_num = #{qna_num}

SELECT qna_num, qna_title, qna_contents, admin_id FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(te_qna te_xpk_qna_pk)*/ rownum rn, qna_num, qna_title, qna_contents, admin_id FROM te_qna WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} AND qna_num > 0; ) WHERE rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum}

SELECT qna_num, qna_title, qna_contents, admin_id FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(te_qna te_xpk_qna_pk)*/ rownum rn, qna_num, qna_title, qna_contents, admin_id FROM te_qna WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} AND qna_num > 0 AND qna_division = '1' ) WHERE rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum}
SELECT count(qna_num) FROM te_qna WHERE qna_num > 0

SELECT qna_num, qna_title, qna_contents, admin_id FROM (SELECT rownum rn, qna_num, qna_title, qna_contents, admin_id FROM te_qna where rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} AND qna_num > 0 AND qna_division like '1' ORDER BY qna_num DESC )
WHERE rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum}

SELECT count(qna_num) FROM te_qna
